title: Check the air quality in any location you want!

tips.text: Regularly ventilate rooms to improve air quality.
Engage in outdoor activities while enjoying clean air.
Maintain proper hydration by drinking plenty of water.
Wearing a mask is not necessary.
Regularly ventilate rooms to improve air quality.
Engage in outdoor activities while enjoying clean air.
Consume meals rich in vitamins and minerals.
Wearing a mask is not necessary.
Ventilate rooms briefly, preferably in the morning.
Limit intense exercise and choose gentler activities like walking or stretching.
Drink warm beverages to support your airways.
Consider wearing a mask during intense exertion.
Close all windows and use an air purifier if possible.
Avoid exercising outdoors; the air quality is poor.
Boost your immunity through a healthy diet and supplements.
If possible, wear a protective mask outdoors.
Close all windows and use an air purifier if possible.
Avoid exercising outdoors; the air quality is poor.
Consult a doctor if you have breathing problems.
If possible, wear a protective mask outdoors.
